content: **the 100 bag** *free pattern and simple-to-follow tutorials available on my totally ad-free website yes they do still exist * **the knit 100 stitches 100g of dk weight yarn** **the bag holds 100g of yarn and is 100% fun** does anyone *really* need a reason for another bag i never do and i already have more than a few… use any dk weight yarn or fingering weight held double an excellent project for a special 100g skein or make it a scrappy project with 100g of leftovers the color block bag shown is knit with brooklyn tweed arbor the multi-colored bag shown is a hand-dyed skein of bfl yarn don t fuss with gauge just use a needle size that provides a dense fabric with your yarn choice knit 1 or 100 - have fun with it & happy knitting
